mapper.select: select r_id, r_mid, r_pid, r_sdate, r_rent, r_state, r_pdate from rental
mapper.insert: insert into rental(r_id, r_mid, r_pid, r_sdate, r_rent, r_state, r_pdate) values(#{r_id},#{r_mid},#{r_pid}, #{r_sdate}, #{r_rent}, #{r_state}, #{r_pdate})
mapper.select: select r_id, r_mid, r_pid, r_sdate, r_rent, r_state, r_pdate from rental where r_id=#{r_id}
mapper.update: update rental set r_state = #{r_state} where r_id = #{r_id}
mapper.select: select product.p_name, rental.r_sdate, rental.r_state, rental.r_pdate from rental, product where product.p_id = rental.r_pid and r_mid = #{r_mid} and r_state not like concat('%',#{r_state},'%') order by r_id desc
